original_text:
The Lord sustains him on his sickbed;
    in his illness you restore him to full health.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그를 병상에서 붙드시고 그가 누워 있을 때마다 그의 병을 고쳐 주시나이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord sustains him on his sickbed
in his illness you restore him to full health
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 병들었을 때 당신은 그를 온전히 회복시키십니다.
